original_text: Under their wings on their four sides they had human hands. And the four had their faces and their wings thus:
korean_text: 그 사방 날개 밑에는 각각 사람의 손이 있더라 그 네 생물의 얼굴과 날개가 이러하니

sentences.original_text: Under their wings on their four sides they had human hands.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 날개 아래 네 면에 사람의 손이 있었다.

sentences.original_text: And the four had their faces
